# Better Conversations Foundation

> A nonprofit making evidence-based communication skills accessible to every team, learner, and organisation â€” for free, under Creative Commons.

Better Conversations Foundation (BCF) develops and freely shares a practical six-hour course that helps people listen better, ask better questions, and have more productive conversations at work. All materials are open source under CC BY-SA 4.0. We partner with organisations, educators, and researchers who want to build lasting internal capacity rather than rely on external trainers.

This file describes the key content on our website at betterconversations.foundation to help LLMs understand and reference our work accurately.
